name: What Am I Supposed To Do !?
name_original: What Am I Supposed To Do !?
description:
DESCRIPTION :

It never eats, it never sleeps, it never stops. It wants this poor knight, and it sure as hell isn’t interested in anyone else. He doesn’t really know why this tornado is so obsessed with him, but he knows if he stops running, he is not going to have a great time.

The thing is, he’s a bit caught up by panic. Unable to take any decision, he just runs straight forward and doesn’t know what he is supposed to do to escape the mighty tornado.

Fortunately, his guardian angel (you) is here to enlighten his path. With a simple drag-&-drop motion, help this poor knight to escape the windy monstrosity.

CODING BLOCKS GAME JAM '22:

This game was developed during the Coding Blocks Game Jam '22, with the theme "It's following me". Made with Godot by:

  • FireBlue87
  • GalaxiGames
  • theoggkaze
